Subclasses of NeuralNet in no.patternsolutions.javann
 class Adaline
           A simple neural net for linear separable problems.
 class Backpropagation
           A backpropagation network is build up by layers of nodes.
 class Bam
          A neural network that consists of two fully interconnected layers of processing nodes.
 class Hebb
           A simple neural net for linear separable problems.
 class Hopfield
          A neural net with one layer of fully connected nodes.
 class Kohonen
          Kohonens self-organizing network consists of two layers that can organize a topological map from a random starting point.
